channel.title: eBPF - The latest news, updates and articles covering eBPF and related topics.
channel.description: eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading a kernel module.

item.title: 【Unit Testing eBPF Programs】单位测试EBPF程序
item.description: 【Learn how to test eBPF XDP programs】了解如何测试EBPF XDP程序

item.title: 【Transparent Packet Inspection with Netfilter and eBPF】使用 Netfilter 和 eBPF 进行透明数据包检查
item.description: 【Learn about transparent packet inspection with Netfilter and eBPF】了解使用 Netfilter 和 eBPF 进行透明数据包检查

item.title: 【How to use eBPF for monitoring Linux thread contention?】如何使用EBPF监视Linux线程争议？
item.description: 【Learn to create a minimal scheduler written with sched_ext in C】学会创建一个用sched_ext编写的最小调度程序

item.title: 【Debugging Memory Leaks with eBPF】使用 eBPF 调试内存泄漏
item.description: 【Learn how eBPF and uprobes can be combined to trace memory allocations and detect leaks】了解如何组合 eBPF 和 uprobes 来跟踪内存分配并检测泄漏

item.title: 【P99Conf: How eBPF Could Make Faster Database Systems】P99Conf：eBPF 如何打造更快的数据库系统
item.description: 【Learn about BPF-DB, an in-memory key-value data store that can be planted within the OS kernel itself via eBPF, thereby routing around the restrictions and limitations of an OS’s user space, or the space in memory where a program is typically run】了解 BPF-DB，这是一种内存中键值数据存储，可以通过 eBPF 植入操作系统内核本身，从而绕过操作系统用户空间或程序通常所在的内存空间的约束和限制跑步

item.title: 【How to use eBPF for monitoring Linux thread contention?】如何使用EBPF监视Linux线程争议？
item.description: 【Learn how to use eBPF for monitoring Linux thread contention】了解如何使用 eBPF 监控 Linux 线程争用

item.title: 【eBPF in 2025 - Bigger Than the CrowdStrike Outage】2025年的EBPF - 比众率的停机大
item.description: 【 In 2025 eBPF adoption will expand rapidly and other predictions】在2025年，EBPF采用将迅速扩展和其他预测

item.title: 【Tracepoints, Kprobes, or Fprobes: Which One Should You Choose?】Tracepoints、Kprobes 或 Fprobes：您应该选择哪一个？
item.description: 【Tracing programs like kprobes, fprobes, and tracepoints are very popular, but their overlapping functionality can make choosing the right one confusing.】追踪Kprobes，Fprobes和TracePoint之类的程序非常受欢迎，但是它们的重叠功能可以使选择正确的一个令人困惑。

item.title: 【How to run code in kernel space? eBPF!】如何在内核空间中运行代码？ EBPF！
item.description: 【Learn about eBPF and how to write an eBPF program that capture network packets in the kernel with Go】了解EBPF以及如何编写EBPF程序，该程序在GO中捕获网络数据包

item.title: 【شروع برنامه نویسی در ebpf با یک مثال ساده】以一个简单的示例在EBPF中开始编程
item.description: 【درباره eBPF و نحوه نوشتن برنامه eBPF بیاموزید】了解 eBPF 以及如何编写 eBPF 程序
